content.query:
SELECT
    rate_code_id,rate_code
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/rate_code.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b' ,
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'     
    ) 
    WITH(
        jsonDoc varchar(max)1
    )As ratecode
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    With(
        rate_code_id SMALLINT,
        rate_code varchar(20) 
    )

------------
-- Multi line JSON 
------------

SELECT
    rate_code_id,rate_code
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/rate_code_multi_line.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b' ,
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'     
    ) 
    WITH(
        jsonDoc varchar(max)1
    )As ratecode
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    With(
        rate_code_id SMALLINT,
        rate_code varchar(20) 
    )
